sentences.en: "I detest clutter, you know." — "I didn't know, but I might have guessed."
sentences.cn: “我特别厌恶杂乱无章，你是知道的。”——“我可不知道，不过我早该猜到了。”

sentences.en: I always did detest a welcher.

sentences.cn: 我讨厌奶酪, 我不爱吃.

sentences.en: I detest facing the dilemma of quitting or staying.
sentences.cn: 我痛恨面对闪人或死赖著不走的困境.

sentences.en: I detest people who tell lies.
I don't love you, not at all; on the contrary, I detest you.
sentences.cn: 我不爱你, 一点也不; 相反, 我讨厌你.

sentences.en: I should detest my own heart if I saw either pride or resentment lurking in me.
sentences.cn: 假使我看见我现在还怀怨恨,还藏有傲骨,我就要憎恶我自己.

sentences.en: The righteous detest the dishonest; the wicked detest the upright.
sentences.cn: 为非作歹的,被义人憎嫌.行事正直的, 被恶人憎恶.

sentences.en: The schemes of folly are sin, and men detest mocker.
sentences.cn: 愚妄人的思念 、 乃是罪恶. 亵慢者为人所憎恶.

sentences.en: The two men detested each other.
They detest all that shooting and killing.
sentences.cn: 他们痛恨所有杀人的行为.

sentences.en: Utterly abhor and detest it, for it is apart for destruction.

sentences.en: We love peace, we detest and despise the racists'crimes perpetrated recently.
sentences.cn: 我们热爱和平,对这些天发生的排外罪行, 我们深恶痛绝.
